response.answer_text: Yes, Eminem is still alive. In fact, he just posted a mischievous message on social media as well as reunite with Steve Berman, who is the sales and marketing president at Interscope Records (which distributes Eminem’s music). Sources: Eminem Is Still A Kid At Heart With Outrageous "B*ner" Post Eminem Reunites With Old Foe Steve Berman For "SSLP20" Warning: Articles contain Foul Language!!!

This is the question I've been waiting to hear someone ask! I wonder this myself bc the man they are trying to pass off as M don't look, talk, behave, rap, or respond to media the way the real M would and my answer to this question would be no.
